body.para: Remove all records marked for deletion from the current database file, rebuild all active orders, and recover all physical space occupied by the deleted records. Note that this will not affect memo files. Unused space in memo files can only be recovered by using COPY.
PACK is functionally equivalent to DBPack().

para.text: PACK does not create backup files. You may want to make a backup of the file (using COPY FILE, for example) before issuing this command; otherwise, you will not be able to recover deleted records.
